General.Name: Tianjin Printronics Circuit Corp
General.Description: Tianjin Printronics Circuit Corporation manufactures, sells, and exports PCBs in the People's Republic of China. Its products include multi-layer board with black solder mask, 1 step HDIs, 2-step HDIs, step HDIs with fine pitch, 16-layer boards, military high layer boards, power supply boards, normal boards, 10-layer rigid flex boards, rigid flex boards, and 1-side 2-layer aluminum boards. Further, it offers step board, immersive silver and tin surface, and multi-layer PCB. The company's products are used in various fields, such as industrial automation control, telecommunication, aviation and aerospace, automotive electronics, IT, instrument and meters, medical devices, and consumer electronics. Tianjin Printronics Circuit Corporation was founded in 1988 and is based in Tianjin, the People's Republic of China.
